plot: Peter Paracelsus is a genius working at Chematon, a chemical plant of Mr. 'Didi' Donders. At a certain moment he invents a formula to make artificial gold and so becomes the 'modern Midas'....
plot_en: Peter Paracelsus is a genius working at Chematon, a chemical plant of Mr. 'Didi' Donders. At a certain moment he invents a formula to make artificial gold and so becomes the 'modern Midas'....
plot_es: Peter Paracelsus is a genius working at Chematon, a chemical plant of Mr. 'Didi' Donders. At a certain moment he invents a formula to make artificial gold and so becomes the 'modern Midas'....
title: Midas
